item.title: Dancing Hexapod
item.description: The inspiration for my final project in my Principles of Robotics class stemmed from Boston Dynamics’ video of their dancing robots. I proposed the creation of a hexapod (six-legged) mobile robot that could accurately detect the tempo of a song or audio file being played, and perform a set of dance moves that are synchronized to the beat. As a stretch goal, I wanted the hexapod to move toward the audio source before dancing, just as a human would at a concert.
